turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Geography of Thrissur.
turn.1: What is the geography of Thrissur?
turn.2: Geography of Thrissur The city of Thrissur is situated in the southwest of the South Indian state of Kerala of Thrissur district.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: A landlocked city, Thrissur is located on a hillock which is surrounded by Thrissur Kole Wetlands.
turn.5: What does it share with nearby cities and districts?
turn.6: Thrissur district borders with Palakkad district in east, Malappuram district in the north, Ernakulam district in the South and Arabian Sea in the west.
turn.7: What elevation does the city lie at?
turn.8: The city lies at and has an average altitude of 2.83 metres.
turn.9: Where is it located in relation to other cities and districts?
turn.10: The city is located in midland regions of Kerala, with an extended part of Palakkad plains.
turn.11: What features drain the water away from the city?
turn.12: It is situated in hillock, which allows rain water to automatically drain out of the city.
